mapper.select: select c.ROOM_NO as roomNo , c.MBR_NO as mbrNo , c.MBR_NAME as mbrName , c.MBR_PHONE_NO as mbrPhoneNo , c.MBR_PHOTO_URL as mbrPhotoUrl , c.GCM_REG_ID as gcmRegId , c.ROOM_MBR_NO as roomMbrNo , c.ROOM_MBR_NAME as roomMbrName , c.ROOM_MBR_ST as roomMbrSt , c.REL_FRND_PHONE_NO as relFrndPhoneNo , c.MUTUAL_YN as mutualYn , c.ROOM_MBR_RANK as roomMbrRank from ( select a.ROOM_NO , a.MBR_NO , a.MBR_NAME , a.MBR_PHONE_NO , a.MBR_PHOTO_URL , a.GCM_REG_ID , b.ROOM_MBR_NO , b.ROOM_MBR_NAME , a.ROOM_MBR_ST , a.REL_FRND_PHONE_NO , a.MUTUAL_YN , a.ROOM_MBR_RANK from ( -- 참여회원 정보 select a.ROOM_NO, a.MBR_NO, b.MBR_NAME, b.MBR_PHONE_NO, b.MBR_PHOTO_URL, a.GCM_REG_ID, a.ROOM_MBR_NO, a.ROOM_MBR_ST, a.REL_FRND_PHONE_NO, a.MUTUAL_YN, a.ROOM_MBR_RANK from ROOM_MBR a , MBR b where 1 = 1 and a.MBR_NO = b.MBR_NO and a.ROOM_NO = #{value} ) a left outer join ( -- 알고 들어가게된 사람정보 select a.room_no, a.ROOM_MBR_NO, b.MBR_NAME AS ROOM_MBR_NAME, a.GCM_REG_ID from ROOM_MBR a , MBR b where 1 = 1 and a.ROOM_MBR_NO = b.MBR_NO and a.ROOM_NO = #{value} group by a.room_MBR_NO ) b on a.ROOM_MBR_NO = b.ROOM_MBR_NO ) c left outer join ( -- 연결 친구 정보 select a.ROOM_NO, a.MBR_NO, b.FRND_NAME, b.FRND_PHONE_NO from ROOM_MBR a , FRND b where 1 = 1 and a.MBR_NO = B.MBR_NO and a.REL_FRND_PHONE_NO = b.FRND_PHONE_NO and a.ROOM_NO = #{value} group by a.MBR_NO ) d on c.ROOM_NO = d.ROOM_NO and c.MBR_NO = d.MBR_NO where 1 = 1 and c.ROOM_NO = #{value} order by c.ROOM_MBR_RANK

select a.ROOM_NO as roomNo , a.MBR_NO as mbrNo , b.MBR_NAME as mbrName , b.MBR_PHONE_NO as mbrPhoneNo , b.MBR_PHOTO_URL as mbrPhotoUrl , a.GCM_REG_ID as gcmRegId , a.ROOM_MBR_NO as roomMbrNo , c.MBR_NAME as roomMbrName , a.ROOM_MBR_ST as roomMbrSt , a.REL_FRND_PHONE_NO as relFrndPhoneNo , a.MUTUAL_YN as mutualYn , a.ROOM_MBR_RANK as roomMbrRank from ROOM_MBR a left outer join MBR b on a.MBR_NO = b.MBR_NO left outer join MBR c on a.ROOM_MBR_NO = c.MBR_NO
where 1 = 1 and a.ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} and a.MBR_NO = #{mbrNo}
SELECT count(*) FROM ROOM_MBR WHERE ROOM_NO=#{value}

-- 내 친구 관계 select #{roomNo} as roomNo , #{mbrNo} as mbrNo , A.MBR_NAME as mbrName , A.MBR_PHONE_NO as mbrPhotoNo , A.MBR_PHOTO_URL as mbrPhotoUrl , #{gcmRegId} as gcmRegId , X1.MBR_NO as roomMbrNo , '1' as roomMbrSt , null as relFrndPhoneNo , 'Y' as mutualYn , (select max(ROOM_MBR_RANK) + 1 from ROOM_MBR where ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}) as roomMbrRank from MBR A , ROOM_MBR X1 , MBR X2 where 1 = 1 and A.MBR_NO = #{mbrNo} and X1.MBR_NO = X2.MBR_NO and X1.ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} and X2.MBR_PHONE_NO in ( select Y.FRND_PHONE_NO from FRND Y where 1 = 1 and Y.MBR_NO = #{mbrNo} )
union all
-- 내 친구의 친구 관계 select #{roomNo} as roomNo , #{mbrNo} as mbrNo , A.MBR_NAME as mbrName , A.MBR_PHONE_NO as mbrPhotoNo , A.MBR_PHOTO_URL as mbrPhotoUrl , #{gcmRegId} as gcmRegId , X1.MBR_NO as roomMbrNo , '1' as roomMbrSt , X3.FRND_PHONE_NO as relFrndPhoneNo , 'Y' as mutualYn , (select max(ROOM_MBR_RANK) + 1 from ROOM_MBR where ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}) as roomMbrRank
from MBR A , ROOM_MBR X1 , MBR X2 , FRND X3 where 1 = 1 and A.MBR_NO = #{mbrNo} and X1.MBR_NO = X2.MBR_NO and X1.MBR_NO = X3.MBR_NO and X1.ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} and X3.FRND_PHONE_NO in ( select Y.FRND_PHONE_NO from FRND Y where 1 = 1 and Y.MBR_NO = #{mbrNo} )
union all
-- 나와 관계없는 경우 select #{roomNo} as roomNo , #{mbrNo} as mbrNo , A.MBR_NAME as mbrName , A.MBR_PHONE_NO as mbrPhotoNo , A.MBR_PHOTO_URL as mbrPhotoUrl , #{gcmRegId} as gcmRegId , null as roomMbrNo , '0' as roomMbrSt , null as relFrndPhoneNo , null as mutualYn , (select max(ROOM_MBR_RANK) + 1 from ROOM_MBR where ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}) as roomMbrRank
from MBR A where 1 = 1 and A.MBR_NO = 1
limit 1

SELECT a.ROOM_NO as roomNo , a.MBR_NO as mbrNo , b.MBR_NAME as mbrName , b.MBR_PHONE_NO as mbrPhoneNo , b.MBR_PHOTO_URL as mbrPhotoUrl , a.GCM_REG_ID as gcmRegId , a.ROOM_MBR_NO as roomMbrNo , c.MBR_NAME as roomMbrName , a.REL_FRND_PHONE_NO as relFrndPhoneNo , a.MUTUAL_YN as mutualYn , a.ROOM_MBR_RANK as roomMbrRank FROM ROOM_MBR a join MBR b on a.MBR_NO = b.MBR_NO left outer join MBR c on a.ROOM_MBR_NO = c.MBR_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} AND a.MBR_NO NOT LIKE #{mbrNo}

SELECT a.ROOM_NO as roomNo , a.GCM_REG_ID as gcmRegId FROM ROOM_MBR a WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.ROOM_NO = #{value}
